titles.title: Commonsense Competition and Access to Health Insurance Act
Commonsense Competition and Access to Health Insurance Act
A bill to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to provide greater flexibility in offering health insurance coverage across State lines.
Commonsense Competition and Access to Health Insurance Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
